title: Technique uses well-known dye to watch amyloid plaques in the brain

title_detail.value: Technique uses well-known dye to watch amyloid plaques in the brain

summary: New work repurposing one of the oldest known reagents for amyloid looks to help provide a clearer picture of how fibrils come together.

summary_detail.value: New work repurposing one of the oldest known reagents for amyloid looks to help provide a clearer picture of how fibrils come together.
